definition: to drill/to bore/to get into/to make one's way into/to enter (a hole)/to thread one's way through/to study intensively/to dig into/to curry favor for personal gain

sentences.english: You're too superficial to appreciate great literature like this.
sentences.chinese: 你沒有鑽勁，無法欣賞這類文學鉅著。

sentences.english: Class attendance seriously, and actively raised their hands to speak, learning strong drilling.
sentences.chinese: 上課認真聽講，積極舉手發言，學習有鑽勁。
